articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: 'Trailblazer Rafiq has created a watershed moment'
articles.description: BBC Sport looks back on Azeem Rafiq's emotional testimony on racism in cricket, what it means for the sport and what needs to happen next.
articles.content:
Emotional Rafiq tells MPs about racism at Yorkshire
A "watershed moment" led by a "trailblazer" - who could "empower a new generation".
Azeem Rafiq's emotional testimony about his experiences of ra… [+4897 chars]

articles.author: Mihir Bose
articles.title: Will this be a watershed moment for English cricket? I hope so, but I doubt it
articles.description: Azeem Rafiq’s detailing of the treatment he faced was dramatic – but cricket history shows change of a fundamental nature comes only when it is imposed from the top
articles.content: Cricket has always seen itself as the idyllic English game. As George Orwell described it everyone plays in braces, where the blacksmith is liable to be called away in mid-innings on an urgent job, a… [+5051 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
